conclusion: The blocks are arranged in a scattered pattern on the green surface with no indication of initial movement.
Car A is positioned on the right side of the image with an arrow indicating its direction of movement towards the left.
Car A will first encounter the red block as it moves from the right to the left.
After colliding with the red block, car A will continue moving leftward.
Car A will collide with the green block below the red one.
Car A will collide with the green block above the red one.
Car A will collide with the orange block below the green ones.
Car A will collide with the blue block above the orange ones.
Car A will come to a stop at the point where the last block (the blue one) is located.
Car A will collide with the red, green, green, orange, and blue blocks in sequence, and it will eventually stop at the location of the blue block.
